abstract: Former University of Mississippi student Graeme Harris is indicted on federal charges in connection with noose put on statue of James Meredith, student who integrated the campus in 1962.
lead_paragraph: A former University of Mississippi student has been indicted on federal charges in connection with a noose put on a statue of James Meredith, the student who integrated the campus.

headline.main: Mississippi: Man Charged in Noose Display
headline.print_headline: National Briefing | South; Mississippi: Man Charged in Noose Display

snippet: A former University of Mississippi student has been indicted on federal charges in connection with a noose put on a statue of James Meredith, the student who integrated the campus.
